name: games-of-life
description: is a Mathematical solution to any Game of Life variation

scripts.build: npm test && npm run browserify && npm run minify; npm run docs; npm run docs:generateSVG; git status
scripts.browserify: for x in demo dist; do npm run browserify_$x; done
scripts.browserify_demo: NODE_ENV=production NODE_PATH=src browserify demo/hexagonal/index.js -t babelify -o docs/js/demo-hexagonal.js
scripts.docs: for x in _data generateSVG homepage; do npm run docs:$x; done
scripts.docs:_data: for x in package.json tags.json; do npm run docs:_data:$x; done
scripts.docs:homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > docs/index.md; cat README.md >> docs/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run docs; npm run docs:generateSVG; cd docs; jekyll serve; cd ..
scripts.lint: for x in demo src test; do npm run lint:$x; done
scripts.lint:test: cd test; standard --global describe --global it; cd -
scripts.minify: cd dist; uglifyjs ${npm_package_name}.js --source-map --output ${npm_package_name}.min.js --compress --mangle -b beautify=false,preamble='"// http://g14n.info/games-of-life"'; cd -
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; git push origin master
